revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #59 Maranga |image = [[File:Maranga.png]] |caption = This Berry resembles the Durin Berry, however its spikes are less pronounced. It is quite delicious when roasted. |growtime = 11h 12m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 3100 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *35 sweet *30 bitter *10 sour }} '''Maranga''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Salac]] and at least 1 [[Petaya]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 24 mins || 2 hours 48 mins || 5 hours 36 mins || 11 hours 12 mins - 22 hours 24 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 11 hours 12 mins -
22 hours 24 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 7 hours 28 mins -
14 hours 56 mins || 90 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 hours 58 mins 40 secs -
8 hours 57 mins 20 secs || 60 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Maranga berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Salac]] || - || - || - |- | [[Petaya]] || 24 hours until ripe || 16 hours until ripe || 10 hours 40 mins until ripe |} {{Berries}}
